alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 9:28PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1015 PM MST... At 928 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New River to 8 miles east of Lake Pleasant to near Arrowhead Mall. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Lake Pleasant and Anthem. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 219 and 241. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 13 and 30. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 131 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa; Northwest Valley
